rules.title: Game Rules
body: Move Pepe with arrow keys; D = bottle, F = supernova.
Avoid hits, collect coins & hearts, defeat the endboss.
Pause anytime via the top UI bar.

imprint.title: Imprint
body: E-mail: kontakt@metafeller.com – Content provided without guarantees.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
body: We do not process personal data beyond the scope of this game.
Any telemetry is solely for technical stability.
External links lead to sites with their own policies.
